pages.text: Asaphus' headshield and tailshield are semicircular and without a border and are roughly the same size. It had small protruding eyes raised on a stalk. Its name comes from the Greek asaphes(indistinct).
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
